name: Space Panic (itch)
description:
Space Panic

Mission based adventures in space. Pilot a star ship through asteroids and enemy fighters, acquiring upgrades to weaponry and ship systems. Space Panic includes five levels, each with different objectives. All assets are from the Kenny collection.

Features
  • 2D graphics
  • Twin stick shooter mechanic
  • Top down action
  • 5 missions
  • Compiled with Kenny assets
